author: Therese Reyes, Natashya Gutierrez
title: How to Stay Sustainable During Home Quarantine
description: While we’re relying on prepackaged food and gadgets more than ever, limiting waste and conserving energy is still possible while stuck indoors.
content:
This article originally appeared on VICE Asia.
With anxieties running high because of coronavirus fears, people are now changing their daily habits. Even some of the most environmentally woke people cant resist the safety of disposable face masks and the con… [+4078 chars]
